entries.abort: Abort code received, trying to perform emergency hyperspace jump.
entries.angry_disable: You will pay for this, Rebel scum!
entries.arrival_phase_1: The target should arrive in this system any moment now.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The Imperial ship has arrived. Intercept and disable it quickly!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_update: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show armed fighter vessels on intercept course. >
entries.capture_complete: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel self repairing and powering up. >
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_1_1: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_1_2: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_1_3: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_1_4: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_1_5: Unit has breached target vessel. Terminating threats to unit.
entries.capture_phase_2: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_phase_2_1: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_phase_2_2: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_phase_2_3: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_phase_2_4: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_phase_2_5: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Self repairing ship now.
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Scans show droid unit in contact with target vessel and initiating capture sequence. >
entries.complete: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.complete_1: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.complete_2: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.complete_3: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.complete_4: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.complete_5: Navigation course set. Initiating jump to hyperspeed.
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Sensors still show armed fighter vessels in immediate area. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.failed_destroy: The Imperial ship has been destroyed. Abort mission. We'll get them next time!
entries.failed_escape: The Imperial ship got away! Get out of there before reinforcements come your way.
entries.panic_1: Sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_2: Sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_3: Sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_4: Sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_5: Sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the Imperial ship so that the space assault droid can take control of the ship. To target specific components on a star ship, input the bracket commands ( ] or [ ) to your tactical computer.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the stolen ship to the safety of our base. The Empire will not let you leave unscathed if they can prevent it so stay sharp.
entries.quest_location_d: Lately there's been an increasing Imperial presence in the Dantooine system. If we can capture some of their ships it will make us stronger and them weaker as well as provide some useful information.
entries.quest_recover_d: The droid is now working on taking control of the ship. Protect it from Imperial fighters until the droid is done.
entries.recovery_success: The ship is ours, on it's way to one of our space docks right now. Excellent work pilot!
entries.target_disabled: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel disabled. Transferring droid model IG-31-V to target vessel. >
entries.taunt_1: You have broken multiple Imperial laws. Surrender or face the consequences.
entries.taunt_2: You Rebel scum think you can do as you please around here. Well it ends now!
entries.taunt_3: Rebel fool! You think we would just let you fly out of here with one of our ships?
entries.taunt_4: I hope you didn't expect to come back from this mission Rebel?
entries.taunt_5: The might of the Empire will crush you like the bug you are, Rebel fool!
entries.thanks_1: Sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_2: Sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_3: Sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_4: Sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_5: Sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.title: Dantooine system: Duty mission: Capture Imperial ships.
entries.title_d: To level the war against the Empire a bit more we have decided to try and steal some of their fighter ships. They will also prove useful in infiltration and terror attacks against the Imperial fleet. Your ship is armed with an automated space assault droid that will take control of the enemy ship once you have disabled it. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
